title.narrative: ADOLESCENTS AND YOUTH SKILLS DEVELOPMENT

description.narrative: Output 3. Adolescents and youth are provided with the opportunities to develop their 21st century skills to actively and productively participate in society, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Innovation, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, children and youth benefit from quality and inclusive education and skills development

title.narrative: Output 3. Adolescents and youth are provided with the opportunities to develop their 21st century skills to actively andproductively participate in society

description.narrative: Skills building programmes IT Girls and UPSHIFT were;implemented in new locations in BiH. IT Girls Clubs were;expanding to high schools;and two manuals on Gender Responsive Teaching Methods and one Arduino manual for high schools were developed.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:06/01/2022
